actual_description: If the status card is available, the user can continue the process.
Customer  Users can have a card type 'prepaid.'
Users can make this balance loading process on the internet or mobile banking systems via iOS or Android devices.
After the user is validated and has at least one prepaid card, the system should check the card status.
The prepaid card balance should equal its current value plus the amount.
The system should only allow users to enter their balance as they have.
After the user finishes the process, the user should be able to view the balance of the prepaid card.
When the user continues with a valid prepaid card, the system should ask for account information, which will be used to load money to the prepaid card.
It should be added after the 'My Cards' page.
If the user does not have a prepaid card, the system should display an error, and the process should be stopped immediately.
If it is not available (dormant or blocked ) process should be stopped, and an error message should be displayed.
When users want to use it on ATMs, shopping, , they should load a certain amount of money to a related card.
Menu Placement  The 'Prepaid Card Loading' process should be under the 'Cards' menu.
The selected account balance should be greater than the loading amount.
On the first step of the loading process, the system should check whether the user has a prepaid card.
After the user finishes the process, the user should be able to view the balance of the prepaid card.
